name: EEWT Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .eewt extension has been maliciously renamed and encrypted by EEWT ransomware . It contains a document, image, video, or other file the ransomware is holding hostage. The .eewt extension is added to the file's normal extension, producing a compound extension like .docx.eewt .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
